snippet.title: A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers DLC - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
A Little to the Left DLC Pack 1 is coming to Nintendo Switch in June 2023: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/a-little-to-the-left-cupboards-and-drawers-70050000040214-switch/

Sort, stack, and organize household objects into particular arrangements in A Little to the Left, a tidy puzzle game with a mischievous cat who likes to shake things up! The upcoming DLC cleans out the cabinets and secret compartments of the home with 25 delightful new Cupboards & Drawers themed puzzles to discover and even more charming illustrations and surprising scenarios.

#ALTTLGame #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
